meanings.definition: The place or source of origin or earliest known history of something.
meanings.sent1: The provenience of the ancient vase was traced back to a small village in Greece.
meanings.sent2: Archaeologists carefully documented the provenience of each artifact they unearthed.
meanings.sent3: The provenience of the lost treasure turned out to be a backyard garden!
meanings.sent4: Her love for painting had a provenience in her childhood memories of colorful sunsets.
meanings.sent5: The provenience of the mysterious sound led them to a hidden room in the old mansion.

meanings.definition: The location where an artifact or archaeological find was discovered.
meanings.sent1: The provenience of the fossil was a remote cave deep in the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The provenience of the ancient coin indicated it was minted in Rome.
meanings.sent3: The provenience of the missing key was finally revealed to be under the couch.
meanings.sent4: In the provenience of the buried city, they found remnants of a once-thriving civilization.
meanings.sent5: The provenience of the rare gemstone was a hidden chamber beneath the temple ruins.
